cards.name: Val, Marooned Surveyor
cards.text:
`Vigilance`
Whenever you `discover`, `investigate`, `scry`, `surveil`, or `seek` one or more cards, Val deals 1 damage to each opponent and you gain 1 life.
cards.zhs_text:
`警戒`
每当你`倾探`，`探查`，`占卜`，`刺探`或`取出`一张或数张牌时，瓦尔向每位对手各造成1点伤害且你获得1点生命。

cards.name: Thendar, the Overminer
cards.text:
`Menace`
Whenever a nonbasic land is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, its controller `conjures` a card named `Wastes:0` onto the battlefield tapped.
At the beginning of your end step, if you control two or more tapped creatures, destroy up to one target nonbasic land.
cards.zhs_text:
`威慑`
每当一个非基本地从战场进入坟墓场时，其操控者将一张名称为`荒野:0`的牌横置`幻变`进战场。
在你的结束步骤开始时，若你操控两个或更多已横置的生物，则消灭至多一个目标非基本地。
